attributes.action: apologise on behalf of England for crimes committed against Scotland throughout the course of history
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England have never formally apologised for what happened at Culloden, or William Wallace's execution, or the theft of the Stone of Scone. These examples are the tip of the ice berg. The least we can expect is an acknowledgement of the wrongs committed against the nation of the Scots.
